author: Josiah Wilmoth
title: U.S. Economy Looks Surprisingly Rosy – Don’t Let the Data Fool You
description: The U.S. economy looks surprisingly rosy amid the coronavirus pandemic, but don't let the data deceive you. The post U.S. Economy Looks Surprisingly Rosy – Don’t Let the Data Fool You appeared first on CCN.com
content:
• Analysts expect the coronavirus outbreak to cause unprecedented damage to the U.S. economy.
  • But recent data releases have given a relatively-rosy snapshot of economic activity.
